title: The Brief – Europe’s Muppets take centre stage
summary_full: It's not exactly novel for self-obsessed politicians to make asses of themselves, but the cacophony in Brussels is reaching fever pitch at a time of genuine geopolitical peril
summary_public: It's not exactly novel for self-obsessed politicians to make asses of themselves, but the cacophony in Brussels is reaching fever pitch at a time of genuine geopolitical peril
